body: Runaway girl story like HigeHiro. Hope the author really made a sequel though. It's the runaway girl story like HigeHiro. The girl, Miyu, had been running away from home for half year and stayed in many men's home. This time, the MC, Taira, is still a virgin boy and he got a neighbour who had sex everyday, so he's hesitating about bringing her in. But they had sex anyway. She doesn't hate virgin boy as long as they can get hard, and he doesn't refuse having sex with a not virgin girl like her anyway. Next day, she's gone, but only to go to school. The neighbour saw her though, so she knew Taira is having sex with a high school girl. They had sex again, and this time he is trying more to make her feel good. In his mind, he doesn't want to lose her, and he also feel happy knowing he can make pleasure her. In the end, he offered to shelter her more, and kind of admit he likes her when she asked back.
